channel.title: NYS:MCO on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oman Raised to Investment Grade by Moody’s as Debt Burden Falls
item.description: Oman has received its second upgrade to investment grade in less than a year, after Moody’s Investors Service raised its sovereign rating from junk.
